title: Strengthening Machine Learning Practical Competencies: Practical Course on Machine Learning-Based Hiring Quality Assessment

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain the three dimensions of the Person-Environment Fit (P-E Fit) theory: person-organization, person-job, and person-group.
Learners can interpret clustering results of job candidates by applying the Partition Around Medoids (PAM) algorithm.
Learners can design a 'hiring quality metric' by analyzing HR data and apply it to an evaluation model.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
